title: Type on Turner Classic Movies (TCM)?
content:
Hello, all:

I'm curious if anyone could help me identify the typefaces used on Turner Classic Movies (TCM):

What typefaces are used in the masthead and navigation:

[http://turnerclassicmovies.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221211827/http:/turnerclassicmovies.com/)

And what about these:

[http://i.cnn.net/v5cache/TCM/Images/Static/hp\_tm\_title.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221211827/http:/i.cnn.net/v5cache/TCM/Images/Static/hp_tm_title.gif)  
 [http://i.cnn.net/v5cache/TCM/Images/Static/sea\_topnav.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221211827/http:/i.cnn.net/v5cache/TCM/Images/Static/sea_topnav.gif)

Many thanks.
author: ttzimmermann

comments.content: There's also some Gothic No. 13 and Futura in there if I'm not msitaken.
